title: Nicaragua - House of Hope
description: Photography from House of Hope, a shelter for women and children out of sex trafficking and prostitution in Managua, Nicaragua.

title: Guatemala
description: Photography from children’s ministry with Casa Church in Mixco, Guatemala.

title: Africa
description: Photography from Impact Africa’s schools ministry and evangelistic visits to squatter villages in Johannesburg, South Africa.

title: Honduras
description: Photography from a construction project and children’s ministry on the side of a mountain in Comayagua, Honduras with Catracho Ministries.

title: Nicaragua - Tesoros de Dios
description: Photography from Tesoro’s de Dios, a ministry devoted to serving children with disabilities through physical therapy, horse therapy, and education in Managua, Nicaragua.

title: El Salvador
description: Photography from school and church visits in San Salvador, El Salvador with Global Passions.
